snippet.title: Full Release Trailer   Eyo Jump n Run RPG
snippet.description:
We are very happy to finally be able to carry out our 1.0 release of our heart project “Eyo - Jump ‘n’ Run RPG” on Steam for the PC in the coming days. At the same time we are also celebrating the release of our 1.0 version for Android (mobile). To bridge the short waiting time until the release in a few days, we are already publishing our release trailer today. We hope you all enjoy it.

Best regards
Software development Wuest

Game description:
Upgrade your robot, equip powerful weapons and defences and uncover the secret of your existence. Merciless enemies, treacherous traps and tricky jump 'n' run passages await you in this Jump 'n' Run RPG adventure by two passionate indie game developers.

#steam  #game  #fullrelease #pc  #android  #jumpnrun  #rpg #indiegame #indiedev #indiegames #indiegamedev 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1871840/Eyo__Jump_n_Run_RPG/
Discord: http://discord.gg/EUT7mSpYM3
Twitter: https://twitter.com/EyoJumpRPG
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/eyojumprpg/
